parameters: 他にも処理がある場合、それぞれのELSEの条件に突っ込んでいく
BGMを再生しない時の処理
Clea (There should be an adventurer's guild in this town)
Clea (If we go there, I'm sure...)

Fortizona Guard: Hmm, is there something troubling you,
miss?
Clea: Um... where is the Adventurer's Guild?

Fortizona Guard: Ah, the Adventurer's Guild is straight
ahead from here.
Clea: Thank you very much... Was that question impolite?

Fortizona Guard: Well, recently the Adventurer's Guild has
been popular, so the citizens' concerns should be resolved
by the guards.
Fortizona Guard: Well, it can't be helped. Take care.

Fotizona Guard: Are you from the Guild? Please don't take
away our jobs too much, okay?

Fotizona Guard: Dragon Slayer! It is an honor to be able to
converse with the hero of the empire.

Clea (The adventurer's guild should be nearby. Don't give up
and let's find it properly.)

Clea (The adventurer's guild should be nearby. Don't give up
and let's find it properly.)

Clea (The adventurer's guild should be nearby. Don't give up
and let's find it properly.)

Clea (The adventurer's guild should be nearby. Don't give up
and let's find it properly.)

Clea (The adventurer's guild should be nearby. Don't give up

events.name: 話しかける用並列処理

parameters:
Clea: I have come from the Adventurer's Guild. Please allow
me to meet with the sinner Pecado.

Fotizona Guard: I've heard the story. He's a dangerous man,
so please try not to get too close.

\CL Area Liberation\c[18]\CL Fotizona Region/Front of Fotizona
Royal Palace\c[0]

Kind Young Man: The location of the Adventurer's Guild? If
you go straight ahead, there will be a guard who can tell
you!

Kind Young Man: What a nice weather! On a day like this, I
want to take a walk towards the grasslands.

Lady Fotizona: 'You're a beautiful young lady. Welcome to
the heart of Fotizona.'

Lady Fotizona: Are you a member of the Adventurer's Guild?
Nice to meet you, enchanting Miss Agonia.

Lady of Fotizona: 'A hero is born from Fotizona! I am proud
to live in this town as a human.'

Lady of Fotizona: Welcome to the heart of Fotizona, you
beautiful young lady.

Deliveryman: Hey, it's a nice weather today. I hope this
sunny weather continues.

Deliveryman: Hey, it's a nice weather today. I hope this
sunny weather continues.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
Bounty Hunter Savan: Did you accept the request?

Bounty Hunter Savan: This request is from a certain client,
and they're looking for a strong and promising warrior.
Clea: What is the reason for looking for a warrior?

Bounty Hunter Savan: I can't disclose the details... but
it's an incredibly important job with a substantial reward.

Clea: I understand... I won't pry any further, but please
make one promise.
Bounty Hunter Savan: What kind of promise?

Clea: Even if we find someone who meets the requirements,
please promise me that you won't do anything to betray that
person!
Bounty Hunter Savan: Alright, let's make a promise.

Clea: Thank you very much. I swear on the name of the guild
that I will accomplish this request.

Priestess Sophia: If that's decided, how about going to
Jinami, a place called the city of martial arts, where
warriors gather?
Clea: Yes, let's go and see.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
Bounty Hunter Savan: I'm counting on someone strong.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
Bounty Hunter Savan: Hmm, this one looks strong...

Bounty Hunter Savan: You pass. If you want to test your own
strength, come with me.

Mercenary Leon: So, the job details are still a secret,
huh?

Bounty Hunter Savan: Sorry, but I can't explain it here...
If you're scared, you can go back.

Mercenary Leon: I'll do it! I've trained to spread my own
strength to the world, you know.

Mercenary Leon: Thanks, Clea! I'm looking forward to the
day when we can cross swords again somewhere!

Clea: I'm also looking forward to it, Mr. Leon. I wish you
the best of luck!

Mercenary Leon: Ah, it's a promise. We will definitely meet
again somewhere!

Bounty Hunter Savan: This is your reward. Thanks for doing
a good job.
Clea: He's gone... I hope Mr. Leon's job goes well.

Sophia the Priestess (That bounty hunter Savan's aura is
indeed...)
Clea: Sophia-san, why do you look so gloomy?

Priestess Sophia: Oh my, I wonder if yesterday's wine is
still left over~
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Wealthy Woman: I moved here from Myukos, but I really like
the peaceful atmosphere of this town.

Wealthy Woman: I moved here from Mucos, but I really like
the peaceful atmosphere of this town.
Looking for someone to borrow it is written.
Looking for someone to borrow it is written.

events.name: QI『イベント名』：テンプレート：吉原

parameters: ※※※該当イベント（シート単位）発生時の処理※※※
左記の出現条件をイベントと揃える
※※※該当イベント（シート単位）終了後は条件に1足して空に※※※
※※※該当イベント（シート単位）発生時の処理※※※
左記の出現条件をイベントと揃える
※※※該当イベント（シート単位）終了後は条件に1足して空に※※※
最後には左記の通り、スイッチを条件に空のページを設定
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Clea: Leon-san was a nice person, I wonder if he's doing
well?

Sophia the priestess (If my prediction is correct, I won't
be able to meet Leon-san anymore...)

Priestess Sophia: May the blessings of the goddess
Imiserinos be upon Leon-san...
Clea: What's wrong all of a sudden?

Priestess Sophia: Oh my, even though I may not look like
it, I am a priestess, you know.
Clea: That's right, I will also pray to Lady Imiserinos.

Clea: May the blessings of the goddess Imiserinos be upon
Leon-san...
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Chef Meri: I'll do my best to meet the expectations of this
amazing opportunity I've been given.

Thief Nora: Don't worry, Meri-san! The porridge was really
delicious, I want to eat it again!
Chef Meri: It's an honor for a chef to hear you say that.
Owner Tokyo: I'm really grateful for all of your help.
Owner Tokyo: I don't know... but he is a chef.

Owner Tokyo: He should definitely return to being the kind
chef he used to be.

Owner Tokyo: If you're willing, I'd like you to receive
additional rewards.
Clea: Thank you very much, Tokyo-san.

Owner Tokyo: I'll do my best to train my successor. Please
come visit Restaurant Miro.
Chef Meri: I'll go too! Let's all stay energetic!
イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Guard Coke: I apologize for the trouble, but you've
certainly grown up splendidly.
Thief Nora: Do you know Clea-san?

Guard Coke: It's natural that I don't remember, but the
Adventurer's Guild is straight ahead from here.

Clea: I remember...! It's when I first came to Fotizona
Avenue!

Clea: Thank you very much for guiding me back then. I was
really saved.

Guard Coke: It's fine, that's the job of a guard. Even
though you used to feel like a village girl, now you're in a
splendid warrior's appearance.
Guard Coke: It seems like you'll handle my request well.
Clea: May I ask for the details of the request?

Guard Coke: My idiot colleagues who have been working here
for over three years, even the people in town like them.

Guard Coke: I don't want to lose this lifestyle... so I
want you to bring me something from the Camps' house.
Guard Coke: This is proof that I was a thief.

Thief Nora: Are you living while hiding the fact that you
were a thief!?

Guard Coke: Luckily, I got caught by General Atu and now I
have this life where I can atone for my sins under him.
Clea: Isn't it unnecessary to collect the evidence now?

Guard Coke: I also thought so... but somehow, I feel like
it's better to settle things properly.

Thief Nora: Clea-san, I also want to help as a fellow
thief!

Guard Coke: Hahaha, I used to be one, you know. Besides,
it's not good to say 'thief' in front of the guards, right?

Guard Coke: This is the map that hides the evidence. The
Camps' house has tight security, so please don't do anything
reckless, okay?
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
